Package networking.frontend

Interface NetworkMessenger

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameServer, PlayerClient
public interface NetworkMessenger

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.Queue<NetworkDataObject> getQueuedMessages()
    Gets a queue containing all messages that have been received.
    void sendMessage​(java.lang.String messageType, java.lang.Object... message)
    Sends data to other connected clients.

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage​(java.lang.String messageType, java.lang.Object... message)
      Sends data to other connected clients.
      Parameters:
      messageType - The type of message being sent. For client programs, this should always be NetworkDataObject.MESSAGE.
      message - Any number of objects containing data to be sent.

    • getQueuedMessages

      java.util.Queue<NetworkDataObject> getQueuedMessages()
      Gets a queue containing all messages that have been received. Your program should remove items from this queue as you process the messages so that they don't build up (messages will get garbage collected once they're removed from here).
      Returns:
      A queue containing all messages received by this client in the order that they were received.
